trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN gives you greater control over the types of content you see, on top of protecting your location and browsing activity.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN ti da un control plui grant sui gjenars di contignûts visualizâts, sore che a protezi la tô posizion e lis tôs ativitâts di navigazion.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Within the settings page, you can navigate to “Privacy Features” to see everything you’re able to do to enhance your experience.
trans-unit.target: Te pagjine des impostazions, tu puedis navigâ a “Funzions pe riservatece” par viodi dut ce che tu puedis fâ par miorâ la tô esperience.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Ad-blocking: Reduces the number of ads you see when you’re using VPN.
trans-unit.target: Bloc dai anuncis: al ridûs il numar di publicitâts che tu viodis cuant che tu dopris la VPN.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Tracker-blocking: Fewer harmful domains will be able to track you.
trans-unit.target: Bloc des spiis: mancul dominis danôs a rivaran a stâti daûr.

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Block malware: Helps protect you from ransomware, phishing, spyware, viruses, and malware.
trans-unit.target: Bloc dai malware: al jude a parâti di ransomware, phishing, spyware, virus e malware.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: If you activate these features, they’ll overwrite any custom DNS you’re using. These protections are not a substitute for taking other security precautions — for example, while blocking malware you should still avoid downloading attachments in strange emails.
trans-unit.target: Se tu ativis chestis funzions, a sostituiran ducj i DNS personalizâts che tu stâs doprant. Chestis protezions no sostituissin la adozion di altris precauzions di sigurece: par esempli, ancje se tu ativis il bloc dai malware, in ogni câs tu varessis di evitâ di discjariâ zontis di e-mails stranis.
Utilizazion des funzions avanzadis pe riservatece
